website_summaries.verdict: This robe comes at a lower price point than competing designs without sacrificing fashion or function.
pros: Shorter length robe falls just above the knee
Dries well if worn right after getting out of the shower
Soft and cozy to wear all throughout the winter
cons: If you wear on damp skin, some material may rub off on you

customer_reviews.title: So the robe itself is super soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So the robe itself is super soft and comfortable. But the material rubs off on literally everything. If your skin is a little damp you'll get little pieces on yourself. If you lay it on your bed or clothes it'll rub off and leave little fuzzies. Tried washing it but that didn't help either. So if you're okay with that go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Bartels

customer_reviews.title: Best robe I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: For the price, the quality cannot be beat. The best fitting, most comfortable robe I've ever owned. Highly recommend. Doesn't stay in stock long, I've bought several and had to wait months for the item to appear again. Don't wait, buy now! It's cheap!! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift for my wife that I am glad I got. I earned some brownie points for this one 8~)
customer_reviews.text: The robe showed up on time and was even a nicer rob that what I expected from the pics. It fits perfect and it is very soft and cuddly. She wears it every morning and I enjoy hugging and snuggling with her in it 8~) Guys, do yourselves a favor and buy one of these for your wife/girlfriend, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Bunker

customer_reviews.title: Everything its advertised to be.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my granddaughter and she was thrilled. I wanted it super soft and it is. I really meant to order the pink but I forgot to change the color when selecting and received the Navy, but she loves it. She is really tiny like a size two so wanted this to be a size small but it only came in a small/medium. She just tightens up on the belt. I would certainly recommend this robe if anyone is thinking of purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: jaguarfan

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, warm and comfy. Tears easy though.
customer_reviews.text: This honestly deserves 5 stars. Only reason it doesn’t get it is because I’ve only washed it twice so far and it has two holes already. Other then that it’s extremely warm and comfortable. Perfect if you’re looking to stay in somewhere cold like a hospital. Super soft to touch. Love mine just wish I didn’t have to patch it up so often.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: like they say
customer_reviews.text: It was slightly smaller than I expected, but still fits. Unfortunately, there was an opening in the sleeve -- near the top -- that arrived unstitched. So, I have to fix that before I use it. And, now, I'm hoping that there won't be anymore "rips" when I start wearing it. (But I'll be washing it on "gentle" just to be careful.) Well, like they say, "You get what you pay for." And since this wasn't an expensive robe, well...
customer_reviews.author: PMG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Lovely. Fluffy. Better than pictured! Fast shipping! Recipient of gift is really happy. Washes and dries well
customer_reviews.author: Shellie

customer_reviews.title: worth the $
customer_reviews.text: nice robe, doesnt shed as others say it does, perfect for me to get out of shower, i do have a towel around me, but my arms and legs are bare and do not get any threads on me. it is thick well made and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Fleece Pembrook Ladies Robe
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift which will be too long in the sleeves and too long in the body. Will not be a good fit - so I am trying to send it back. Has not been picked up yet by UPS after waiting 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Sewing Quality is Very Poor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this robe in the hopes of it being comfy and warm, which it is, however, there are numerous strings hanging off and there are holes everywhere after 1 week. I may just not have noticed after I opened the packaging. I am very disappointed with this robe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mom Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my 90 year old Mom. Nearly every time I call her, she again thanks me for it. She says it's very comfortable. Love ya, Mom!
customer_reviews.author: William J. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: item as described for a great price
customer_reviews.text: was the perfect gift fit as expected. very warm and cozy great for the cold mornings perfect pink color
customer_reviews.author: jjkct

customer_reviews.title: Winter use robe
customer_reviews.text: Its soft and warm. Perfect for the winter but more for warmth than towel purposes. I was looking for something to dry when my girl friend comes out the shower but this was not it. I will keep it as it is warm for the winter but will shop around for a more towel based material robe.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Orueta

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, doesn't seem to pill or shed
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, doesn't seem to pill or shed. Soo soft. I used this a lot over the winter, especially before getting in and out of our hot tub. I also bought a men's one for my husband. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Fit is great and materials are SUPER SOFT and warm. I baught this for my aunt for Christmas and she absolutely loved it she said she wears it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Saucier

customer_reviews.title: My wife love's it.
customer_reviews.text: My wife is pregnant so i got her a size bigger, and she loved how comfortable it fits, and its not to tight on her belly, she wears it all the time when we have cool nights. She is planning to wear it during her stay at the hospital when she delivers. We all know how cold hospitals can be.
customer_reviews.author: mpj

customer_reviews.title: Love this robe
customer_reviews.text: Fits great it's nice and soft. I have washed it a couple of times no shrinkage and it's still soft and fluffy. I plan to buy another one. The price is unbeatable
customer_reviews.author: Tracey RobinsonTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Sons girlfriend seemed to really like it. Was very soft and a pretty navy ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. Sons girlfriend seemed to really like it. Was very soft and a pretty navy blue.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy S

customer_reviews.title: Don't Miss Out On This Beauty!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I opened this. It was beautifully packaged in a clear plastic zippered bag and tied in a bow. When I pulled the robe out, I actually let out an audible gasp at how beautiful it was. Soft, heavy, and fits on point. If you are looking for a lounging robe or direct out of the shower robe or just something to snuggle in...I suggest you get yourself one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Maconeghy

customer_reviews.title: the cut and fit is awkward at best. I sent it back before wearing or washing ...
customer_reviews.text: the cut and fit is awkward at best. I sent it back before wearing or washing so no idea how it would hold up to washing and drying. It was shaped funky, ties in the wrong spot and was not a good fit at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly L.

customer_reviews.title: Great robe but look for gaps!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, warm, soft, roomy, easy to wash — but part of a seam wasn’t sewn. I easily fixed that but am deducting a star for poor construction.
customer_reviews.author: Merry V. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Odd fit
customer_reviews.text: This was a funky fitting robe. The pockets were way off and ended up in the mid front range. Just felt all weird. Material seems ok, but fit was odd. Returned product. The return policy was easy and customer service did great job with fast refund. Just did not fit me right at all.
customer_reviews.author: J. Grimes

customer_reviews.title: extremely fluffy and comfortable especially for older people who use it to stay warm
customer_reviews.text: bought for my 90 year old mother and she lives in it now, it's a big on the large side, but you can wrap it around and it will stay in place. Wish they would have it in a smaller size as well, but I am def going to buy another one as well.
customer_reviews.author: alwaysreading

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Robe!
customer_reviews.text: Such a wonderful robe!! I was not expecting it to be so incredibly plush and soft. I would keep in mind it's very warm, but that makes it perfect for chillier nights. The color was true to the image, a lovely maroony red and the fit was perfect. Would definitely refer to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Nikka Banagale

customer_reviews.title: Very thin material
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight and thin. This is NOT for a cold winter night. It's also knee length. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Anne B.

customer_reviews.title: Missing belt first time
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the first one because it was missing the belt. 2nd one had the belt but due to initial issue was late for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: D Lt

customer_reviews.title: Soft, warm, and fits nicely.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 11-year-old son, who wanted a soft, thick, warm bathrobe. There's nothing to indicate that it's a women's bathrobe and if you didn't find this in the ladies section, you woouldn't know it to be anything other than a nice, generic bathrobe.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sebes

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this robe for my soon-be-fiancé for a Christmas gift and I'm sure she's gonna love it. She's really into spa and self care things, and I'm sure she will be wearing it every day after work! Super soft and high quality material. I'd definitely buy from this seller again, or recommend to a friend. Great quality for a great price! :)
customer_reviews.author: Briley Mitten

customer_reviews.title: Oh the softness!  :)
customer_reviews.text: This robe is very soft I’m very happy with it but it is big on me and should have gone with a Medium. It isn’t a thick heavy robe if your looking for something more bulk, It washed really well and kept its softness.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and cozy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this plush, comfortable robe. The pricing was incredibly reasonable compared to similar products from Macy’s, Target, Kohl’s, etc. Highly recommend this seller!

customer_reviews.title: Very, very soft!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my girlfriend and she loves it. Her first words about it were telling me how soft it was. I also very much agree.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Comfortable Robe

customer_reviews.title: Feels sooo good
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and feel. It is lightweight enough to be comfortable but keeps me warm.

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious!
customer_reviews.text: Luxuriously soft and warm Length is calf length and sleeves are perfect. Just what I wanted.

customer_reviews.title: This product turned out good and wearable
customer_reviews.text: This product turned out good and wearable, BUT... it is not as pictured. The color in the picture looks like soft pink, although the real color is more of blush. The size was off too. It’s long then the waistline with the belt was too high. Awkward. Still, it serves its’ purpose.. soft, absorbing, thick, and warm bathrobe.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel U.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice comfortable robe
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this world and it is so soft and plush is so comfortable and fits true to size the only negative thing is the pockets are very high as opposed to lower

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: It definitely fits the description online. Size, color and description were spot on. It is comfortable and soft and was at a very nice price!

customer_reviews.title: Bought this robe for my daughter, every time she ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this robe for my daughter, every time she used it small threads was stacking on her body even after washing the robe 3 times it continues shedding.
customer_reviews.author: Rakefet

customer_reviews.title: Best robe I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This product was surprisingly soft, well-made and extremely comfortable. Considering how low it’s priced I expected something of a lesser quality but it definitely exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Czarsty

customer_reviews.title: Soft & Warm & Comfy
customer_reviews.text: This robe is like wrapping a soft blanket around yourself. Not sure how it's gonna wash up, but I love it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Ana'

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This robe was ok. I didn't spend a lot of money on it, so my rating isn't that bad. It's on the thin side. This was a gift for my mom and she lives in Florida so it's not really an issue. I wasn't really impressed with even at the price point I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted2Latte

customer_reviews.title: Fuzzy!
customer_reviews.text: Appropriately soft, can wear around the house and relax. Quite warm, so nice when the cooler weather of Seattle that we are known for prevails.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carr

customer_reviews.title: It’s so soft and easy to wear.
customer_reviews.text: I use this robe to cuddle up and watch tv or read a book. It’s so cozy and warm.

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and comfy

customer_reviews.title: Love this robe- so comfy!

customer_reviews.title: Nice , fuzzy, comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Was given as a gift to a friend! Friend very happy with it!

customer_reviews.text: Soft, light fabric, feels warm, great design, wonderful color. Reasonably priced, too.

customer_reviews.title: This was just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: This bathrobe is so lovely, warm, and soft; I am so pleased with this item and it fits well. I noticed an inch long area of loose stitching in the neck seam of the shawl collar, but it is of no consequence, and certainly nothing a little machine stitching can't close. What a perfect, darling bathrobe!

product_meta.title: Pembrook Ladies Robe - Plush Fleece – Kimono Wrap – Spa Bathrobe Women, Girls
feature_bullets: SOFT & COMFORTABLE – Made of ultra-soft fuzzy coral fleece. Slip it on, kick back and enjoy the amazing comfort of this robe after a long day of work. Perfect for relaxing and lounging around the home or spa, day or night. The luxurious comfort of this robe is sure to be a highlight of your day.

SIZE – Comes in two sizes: Small/Medium and Large / X-Large. Designed to be generous and loose fitting without losing an elegant look. The coral fleece fabric has some natural stretch to maximize comfort and fit.

STYLISH – We’ve taken the classic bath robe and added luxurious super soft coral microfleece. Features a shawl collar, kimono wrap front opening, two front pockets and a belt tie closure. Timeless classy design with modern comfort and warmth. Available in a variety of colors, choose a color to complement your nightwear, or opt for a bold colors to express your personality!

VERSATILITY – The coral fleece material is super soft but is still machine washable. Great for relaxing around the house, after a shower or before going to bed. The deep front pockets offer warmth for your hands or a place to put your belongings.

QUALITY – Pembrook has been manufacturing products for 40 years and after that long we’ve learned a thing or two about quality and design. Pembrook has been a family business since 1976 and we fully stand behind the quality of our products. If for any reason you don’t love the robe, return them for a 100% refund.
